entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
